devdoc.details: Contract for liquidity information retrieval in a market.

ClaimPositionCallbackError().details: Throws an error indicating that an error occurred during the claim position callback.

NotExistLpReceipt().details: Throws an error indicating that the specified liquidity receipt does not exist.

NotExistPosition().details: Throws an error indicating that the requested position does not exist.

OnlyAccessableByDao().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not the DAO.

OnlyAccessableByLiquidator().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not the chromatic liquidator contract.

OnlyAccessableByVault().details: Throws an error indicating that the caller is not the chromatch vault contract.

claimableLiquidity(int16,uint256).details: Retrieves the claimable liquidity information for a specific trading fee rate and oracle version from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.oracleVersion: The oracle version for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.

returns.liquidity: claimableLiquidity An instance of ClaimableLiquidity representing the claimable liquidity information.

claimableLiquidityBatch(int16[],uint256).details: Retrieves the claimable liquidity information for multiple trading fee rates and a specific oracle version from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.oracleVersion: The oracle version for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.
params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.

returns.liquidities: claimableLiquidityBatch An array of ClaimableLiquidity instances representing the claimable liquidity information for each trading fee rate.

closingPosition(int16).details: Retrieves the closing position information for a specific trading fee rate from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the closing position.

returns.position: closingPosition An instance of PendingPosition representing the closing position information.

closingPositionBatch(int16[]).details: Retrieves the closing position information for multiple trading fee rates from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the closing position.

returns.positions: pendingPositionBatch An array of PendingPosition instances representing the closing position information for each trading fee rate.

getBinFreeLiquidity(int16).details: Retrieves the available (free) liquidity amount for a specific trading fee rate in the liquidity pool.

params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the available liquidity amount.

returns.amount: The available (free) liquidity amount for the specified trading fee rate.

getBinLiquidity(int16).details: Retrieves the total liquidity amount for a specific trading fee rate in the liquidity pool.

params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the liquidity amount.

returns.amount: The total liquidity amount for the specified trading fee rate.

getBinValues(int16[]).details: Retrieves the values of a specific trading fee rate's bins in the liquidity pool.      The value of a bin represents the total valuation of the liquidity in the bin.

params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rate for which to retrieve the bin value.

returns.values: The value list of the bins for the specified trading fee rates.

getLpReceipt(uint256).details: Throws a `NotExistLpReceipt` error if the liquidity receipt does not exist.

params.receiptId: The ID of the liquidity receipt to retrieve.

returns.receipt: The liquidity receipt with the specified ID.

getLpReceipts(uint256[]).details: Throws a `NotExistLpReceipt` error if the liquidity receipt does not exist.

params.receiptIds: The ID list of the liquidity receipt to retrieve.

returns.receipts: The liquidity receipt list with the specified IDs.

getPosition(uint256).details: Throws a `NotExistPosition` error if the position does not exist.

params.positionId: The ID of the position to retrieve.

returns.position: The position with the specified ID.

getPositions(uint256[]).details: Retrieves multiple positions by their IDs.

params.positionIds: The IDs of the positions to retrieve.

liquidityBinStatuses().details: Retrieves the liquidity bin statuses for the caller's liquidity pool.

returns.statuses: An array of LiquidityBinStatus representing the liquidity bin statuses.

pendingLiquidity(int16).details: Retrieves the pending liquidity information for a specific trading fee rate from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the pending liquidity.

returns.liquidity: pendingLiquidity An instance of PendingLiquidity representing the pending liquidity information.

pendingLiquidityBatch(int16[]).details: Retrieves the pending liquidity information for multiple trading fee rates from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the pending liquidity.

returns.liquidities: pendingLiquidityBatch An array of PendingLiquidity instances representing the pending liquidity information for each trading fee rate.

pendingPosition(int16).details: Retrieves the pending position information for a specific trading fee rate from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the pending position.

returns.position: pendingPosition An instance of PendingPosition representing the pending position information.

pendingPositionBatch(int16[]).details: Retrieves the pending position information for multiple trading fee rates from the associated LiquidityPool.

params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the pending position.

returns.positions: pendingPositionBatch An array of PendingPosition instances representing the pending position information for each trading fee rate.

devdoc.title: MarketLensFacet
